Articles.Content: For a long time. I posted about tethers as a suggestion for ksp. But for the time being i would like a modded tether-system.

For a long time. I posted about tethers as a suggestion for ksp. But for the time being i would like a modded tether-system.

One thing that I've always done is use a KAS winch with a kerbal; If a kerbal grabs the connector to the winch, the craft can real the kerbal back in like a fish on a fishing rod.
